paleoftheancients:Timepiece.NAME: Timepiece
paleoftheancients:Timepiece.FLAVOR: It has no clockhands. The letters T E are carved in its back.
DESCRIPTIONS: Turns back the clock for you at the expense of your enemies once. After combat, restores half your missing HP.

paleoftheancients:BlurryLens.NAME: Blurry Lens
paleoftheancients:BlurryLens.FLAVOR: Everything looks strangely flawed through it.

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheHexaghost.NAME: Hexaghost Pyroplasm
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheHexaghost.FLAVOR: Big enough payoff to be giddy. Too many cards to play to remember it exists when it kicks in.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 36th card played is played 6 times.

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheIroncluck.NAME: Helmet...thing?
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheIroncluck.FLAVOR: Some modifications seem to have been made.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Block, draw a card. Whenever you draw a Status card, gain [E] .

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheSilent.NAME: Garrote of the Silent
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheSilent.FLAVOR: Looks like it was never used.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal damage, that enemy loses 2 HP for every card you play this turn.

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheDefect.NAME: Core of the Defect
DESCRIPTIONS: The first 2 #bpowers each combat are played 3 times.

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheShowman.NAME: Essence of Showmanship
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheShowman.FLAVOR: If you look real closely, there actually is something up my sleeve.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #rExhaust a card, play a #bcopy of it.

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheThorton.NAME: Businesscard of Thorton Minutepen
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheThorton.FLAVOR: What was that guy even doing here?

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheShrineMaiden.NAME: Youkai Huntress' Zeal
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheShrineMaiden.FLAVOR: Born from a lifetime of hunting demons and sweeping floors.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you lost HP last turn, gain [E] . NL Whenever you #yBlock damage, gain that much #rStrength until the end of your turn.

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheShapes.NAME: Shifting Mass
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheShapes.FLAVOR: Constantly in flux between delectable and disgusting.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, flip this relic. NL If it was a

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheGuardian.NAME: Pinecone
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheGuardian.FLAVOR: Whenever you play a Thorn, gain 3 Skills.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b
#yThorns. Whenever you play a #ySkill, #rdouble your #yThorns. At the start of your turn, #rlose all #yThorns gained this way.

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheWokeBloke.NAME: Curiousity
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheWokeBloke.FLAVOR: Hated by cardgame players all across the globe.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yPower is applied to you, gain #b

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheBard.NAME: Polished Lamp
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheBard.FLAVOR: Grants a Wish. Not to be confused with a Fish, Dish or Lish.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of combat, choose a #yrare Attack or Skill, put it into your hand. It costs #b1 less.

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheCollector.NAME: Bottled Champ
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheCollector.FLAVOR: In case of CHAMP, break glass.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose #b2 Attacks and/or Skills in your deck. When playing one of them, play the other as well.

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheWatcher.NAME: Divine Prayer Bead
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheWatcher.FLAVOR: I can't think of any flavortext.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw an extra card, gain #b

paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheBandit.NAME: Fixed Dice
paleoftheancients:SoulOfTheBandit.FLAVOR: Did you know: You can commission Vex to make STS mods for you!?
DESCRIPTIONS: -tile #yGame #yBoard filled with #rpositive #ySpaces. Whenever you spend [E] on a Card, #rMove that many #ySpaces.
